name: Fun Car Simulator Alpha
description: Fun Car Simulator is the home to cars and mods. If you like something  you see in real life vehicles, try them here. The game is clean and low poly with lots of modification choices. As we are just getting started, feel free to give your opinions down below. This is the full alpha version. It comes with 2 new cars and features like slow motion, headlights, and 8 fresh and unrestricted mods. Make sure to check us out on Instagram @fulvousstudio, on carthrottle @fulvoussutio, and on YouTube @fulvousstudio.
